title: Spectator Out Loud: Roddy McDougall, Theo Zenou, Gus Carter and Toby Young
description: On this week’s episode, Roddy McDougall remembers heroes of the speedway, (01:15) Theo Zanou examines at Stanley Kubrick’s fascination with Napoleon, (07:20) Gus Carter looks at a memorial to everyday heroism, (17:20) and Toby Young explains what’s wrong with Equity’s anti-racism guidelines. (21:35)
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
